title: FPS drop in patch 7.15
body: I was playing at a constant fps of around 80 in patch 7.14 yesterday night, but since I updated my client to patch 7.15 my fps had dropped to around 30-40 constant sometimes even 20 during teamfights. I don't know why this is happening, is anyone else having the same issues??

replies.body:
i have the same think too 
did you found a solition ?
i did and have already posted it
iv had the same issue now, and have lost a few ranked matches because of it... i followed and did all the fps issue attempts, no luck iv tried everything and still nothing... how do i fix this?

I've dealt with this issue for 4 days following all standard options. Compleatly updated and reinstalled all drives, windows, and league. FFINAL SOLUTION was changing my port to DMZ. Worked like a charm. Might be a problem with Comcast tho... just my thoughts
Could you please go into more depth about how you found a solution?
Mine isnt as low as yours but at times its 50/60, instead of normal 100ish

ive found a solution!!!! its left click attack move or atleast it was for me i had done it the old way before the patch where you go into your game files and make some commands for making left click attack move! its cause you can do it from ingame now in the menus so it must be a kind bug there 

just make your setting default and go down to the button in keybinds and there should be a little box you can check and uncheck then youll have your attack move again and nice fps and no dcs 

have a nice day hopes this helps  someone atlesat xD

My game usually runs between 60-90 FPS, however sometime after updating to the latest patch (7.15) I was experiencing FPS between 2-4 which has never happened. I have tried trouble shooting the problems, updating all drivers, running scans, etc., however I still have not been able to come up with a solution. My game issues don't stop there though. More recently i have been in a constant state of DC'ing and reconnecting. Usually DC'ing for about 1-2mins then reconnecting for about 5-10 seconds then going immediately back to disconnecting. 
I'm beginning to get very frustrated with this as I have been dealing with this issue for close to a week now. I'm really not sure what else to do besides take my computer to a computer repair shop or something. I just want to know if this is a problem on my side, or Riot's side! If anyone has ANY info please share!!
Mines Is Also having the same problem it dropped to 0
Same here - before was 80 fps. Now i get 10(game even crashes) - i got low priotiy que now. Cuz of that

You might have some bad game files after the update, but there could be outdated drivers involved to.  Go over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide, which should help tune things up a bit for you!
FPS issues is waste of time i'm sure about that. Can you tell me how can i fix these ''bad game files'' ?

Yes im facing the same exact problem as u 
Did u find a solution ?

I'm having the same problem, my fps was all over the place last night. I went from 110 to 35 then back up to 110 so many times in my games. I also had a problem with champ select where my client froze or lagged hard and I couldn't declare my champ in time so she was banned. I didn't have any issue before the update so I'm assuming they're related.
